default.help_text_portrait: 使用重新排列或箭头来改变最上排的数字.使用秘密(?)符号来打开最下排的数字.如果最上排与最下排的数字对中,且位置相同的话,就中奖.你最多可以对中四个!
default.help_text_landscape: 使用重新排列或箭头来改变最上排的数字.使用秘密(?)符号来打开最下排的数字.如果最上排与最下排的数字对中,且位置相同的话,就中奖.你最多可以对中四个!
default.landscape_description: 使用重新排列或箭头来选择数字

0.help_text_portrait: 0Select 4-digit number from 0000 to 9999 and press the draw buttons to reveal winning numbers. There are 12 exciting ways to play and WIN Match 4. For examples of each match option and its payouts, refer to the prize chart below.
0.help_text_landscape: 0Select 4-digit number from 0000 to 9999 and press the draw buttons to reveal winning numbers. There are 12 exciting ways to play and WIN Match 4. For examples of each match option and its payouts, refer to the prize chart opposite.
0.landscape_description: 0Choose your own numbers using the arrows or press shuffle
